_sText:
This a bot map i was bored so i desided to make a bot map.

This map is best with noblock and respawn so the bots can just respawn over and over and they dont get stuck. it is best to put the bots with knife only and on easy so they dont shot back at you. you cana play iver team.

I played this map for 5 mintes and i got around 400 kills.

the bot nav file is in with it. but ti dose not take long for it to be created.

hope u like the map it any thing u want to ask me pm me are comment and please rate.

this map is just a long hall with a hurt tigger in the middile so the bots get put on to around 30hp so it is easier to kill him u can just stay in spawn and wait for them to come to you. 

Max player is 30.

This map is for the weapon achivements that people cant be bofered to kill people with. 

for tje bots to spaw put in to the rcon bot_add ct are and put mp_limitteams 9999 are some thing lie that 

hope you like it
